arts.ttl: Johan Manzambi's late strike seals crucial Freiburg win over Borussia Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: The remainder of the first half saw both teams create chances, with Robin Hack hitting the post for Gladbach and Ritsu Dōan going close for Freiburg, but the score remained 1-1 at the break. The match burst into life in the 14th minute when Franck Honorat of Gladbach sent in a dangerous cross that unfortunately deflected off Freiburg captain Christian Günter and into his own net.

arts.ttl: Freiburg climb past Gladbach after late winner
arts.sum: Johan Manzambi's late winner gave Freiburg a narrow victory over Gladbach.

arts.ttl: Gladbach vs. Freiburg preview: Crucial game in battle for European qualification
arts.sum: Two teams battling for European qualification will face off when Borussia Mönchengladbach welcome Freiburg to Borussia-Park on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Borussia Monchengladbach vs. Freiburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Borussia Monchengladbach and Freiburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Freiburg’s forgotten Daniel-Kofi Kyereh: ‘He’s been suffering for a long time’ – Julian Schuster
arts.sum: After a prominent piece on him appeared in the Thursday print edition of Germany's Kicker Magazine, SC Freiburg head coach Julian Schuster answered questions about Daniel Kofi-Kyereh later in the day at a media round.
